alert.note: Alert for New Castle (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 7:48PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern New Castle, northwestern Kent, Queen Anne`s, northeastern Caroline and central Kent Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 748 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Massey to Old Town. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dover, Centerville, Smyrna, Chestertown, Centreville, Clayton, Oakland, Ridgely, Cheswold, Church Hill, Millington, Sudlersville, Goldsboro, Hartly, Old Town, Jumptown, Delaney Corner, Crumpton, Sassafras and Green Spring. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
